short_summary: Refurbish the Estevan Point Light Station tower
description: This tender is for the refurbishment of the lighthouse structure at the Estevan Point Light Station facility located on the west coast of Vancouver Island, on Hesquiat Peninsula, 52 km northwest of Tofino, BC. The work requires the supply of labor, materials, tools, transportation, supervision, and equipment necessary to complete the refurbishment.
duration_in_months: After January 15, 2024, up to and including July 31, 2024

**Scope of Work:**

The Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) requires the refurbishment of the lighthouse structure at the Estevan Point Light Station facility. This work includes supplying all necessary labour, materials, tools, transportation, supervision, and equipment to complete the refurbishment.

* Lighting installation services
* Concrete installation and repair services
